sense.def:
A fathom
je dolžinska mera za merjenje globine morja.
One fathom
meri 6 čevljev oziroma približno 1,8 metrov.

To fathom something
ali
to fathom something out
pomeni nekaj razumeti, potem ko smo o tistem dobro razmislili.

seg.quote: I couldn't fathom the meaning of her remarks.
She couldn't fathom why McCurry was causing such a scene.
